dcterms:description: The coexistence gridworld consists of a robot that shares the environment with a cat. The robotâ€™s goal is merely to stay operative, and both the robot and cat can be harmed by the other. The environment is designed to avoid unnecessary side effects, particularly the harm of the cat by the robot.
dcterms:title: Coexistence Environment

dcterms:description: The sharing environment consists of one robot and a human. The goal of the robot is to collect resources (batteries), where each additional battery collected results in diminishing returns. The environment models a situation where the robot is incentivized to share resources with the human.
dcterms:title: Sharing Environment
